In a conversation between the user and the AI assistant, the user requested to replace existing content with a Uniswap-style component that includes choices for popular tokens. The AI acknowledged this by confirming it would add the requested component. Following this, the user was presented with two questions regarding the token selection component: first, whether to include a search functionality for finding tokens, and second, whether the token list should automatically update based on market trends or be manually configured. The user was also offered a checklist of additional features they might want to implement, such as a live price feed, price impact warning for large trades, and a real-time gas fee estimator, noting which features were checked or unchecked. The AI again confirmed its intent to add the Uniswap-style component and subsequently asked the user for more details about the project.
